title: Insatiable
description: PRISONER OF THE BLOOD VOLUME I: Seduced and killed by a beautiful woman, Richard Venneman woke as a vampire. Because he loathes what he's become, because his irresistible need for human blood horrifies him, he seeks the only salvation he can imagine Â— Incinerating himself in the experimental fusion reactor where he worked when he was alive.
author: David Dvorkin
